Class AbstractComponent

java.lang.Object
  org.iocaste.shell.common.AbstractElement
      org.iocaste.shell.common.AbstractComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Element>, Component, Element
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractControlComponent, AbstractInputComponent, MenuItem, TableItem, Text
public abstract class AbstractComponent
extends AbstractElement
implements Component

Implementação abstrata de componente. Componentes que não agrupam outros componentes deveriam suceder este.

Author:
Francisco de Assis Prates
